title: It's up to you
brief_description: A survey of supervisory problems which arise in business organisations. The importance of conscientiously developing qualities of executive leadership is illustrated by the story of a junior executive in merchandising who realises that his effectiveness as a leader depends upon his acceptance and application of sound practices in human relations.
